<b>The Predicament Resolving Query</b>

That problem is: "What is the challenge?"

<b>The Challenge Statement</b>

A difficulty assertion succinctly defines what the situation is. It is drafted to create clarity of believed and to minimize the assumptions consumers make regarding the dilemma. At the very least as essential as these factors, a really good challenge assertion retains us from assuming a alternative, previous to we even state the dilemma.
